mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols to avoid detection/network filtering by blending in with existing traffic.
Adversaries may use a non-application layer protocol for communication between host and C2 server or among infected hosts within a network.
Tries to connect to TCP port 23 at 5.52.32.127.
(Process #4) KKveTTgaAAsecNNaaaa.x86_64 enumerates running processes via ProcFS.
Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager
Enumerates processes within the "proc" file system
Detected TCP or UDP traffic on non-standard ports
